name: Komala
description: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.

abilities.name: Comatose
abilities.effect: This Pokémon always acts as though it were Asleep.  It cannot be given another status ailment; it's unaffected by yawn; it can use sleep talk; and so on.
abilities.description: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.
